channel.title: DTO
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from DTO, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Chevron posts first refining loss in four years, hitting shares
Trump says Canada, Mexico tariffs coming Saturday. Stocks dived, then rallied.
Trump says he will send migrants to Guantanamo Bay
item.description: Trump, since taking office last week, has taken numerous actions to crack down on illegal U.S. border crossings and deport undocumented migrants.

item.title: Brazil and German markets bolted past Wall Street stocks in January
FDA approves first new class of pain treatment in 20 years. Vertex shares soar.
White House says Trump funding freeze remains in effect despite rescinding OMB memo
item.description: The OMB memo had directed federal agencies to pause grants and loans pending a review of compliance with the agenda of President Donald Trump.

item.title: Trump accuses Fed, Powell of creating inflation on heels of rate decision
item.description: Trump, who appointed Jerome Powell as Fed chair, has called for lower interest rates and said the president should get a say on the Fed's rate decisio...

item.title: Trump says 25% tariffs on Mexico and Canada may not include oil: 'Oil is going to have nothing to do with it as far as I’m concerned'
item.description: The president confirmed his long-threatened tariffs will come into effect on Saturday, and said they “may or may not rise with time.”

item.title: Goldman strategist says he’ll turn ‘tactical bear’ after Valentine’s Day
Trump lashes out at Biden, DEI efforts after D.C. plane crash
item.description: President Donald Trump, without offering evidence, said the collision between an American Airlines jet and an Army helicopter "could have been" due to...
